name: Boomclimb
description:
In BoomClimb, you use small explosions to throw yourself upwards! Pass by obstacles and take a break on the easy platforms, but don't take too long... the rising flames might reach you!

BoomClimb was developped during a private GameJam organized by Homa Games (thank you for this opportunity!). The game was created by Victor Durel, Axel Kus and Francis Blanchet.
